name: RemotCopy
description: Copies a folder from local/remote to local/remote
author: NubeOne

inputs.name: description
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Description of your task (will be shown under the task name)

inputs.name: remote1
inputs.label: Folder location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select 'local' if the folder is located on the TFS Server or in a build artifact, remote otherwise

inputs.name: server1
inputs.label: Server Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the server where the folder is located

inputs.name: userName1
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username to be used to connect to the server

inputs.name: password1
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password to be used to connect to the server

inputs.name: remote2
inputs.label: Folder location
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select 'local' if the folder is located on the TFS Server or in a build artifact, remote otherwise

inputs.name: server2
inputs.label: Server Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the server where the folder should be copied

inputs.name: userName2
inputs.label: Username
inputs.helpMarkDown: Username to be used to connect to the server

inputs.name: password2
inputs.label: Password
inputs.helpMarkDown: Password to be used to connect to the server

inputs.name: recurseCopy
inputs.label: Recurse
inputs.helpMarkDown: Copy files in target folder and all subfolders

inputs.name: container
inputs.label: Retain folder structure
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is set to false, all copied files will be located directly in the target folder

inputs.name: includeCopy
inputs.label: Include
inputs.helpMarkDown: Copy only files fitting these comma-separated patterns

inputs.name: excludeCopy
inputs.label: Exclude
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do not copy files fitting these comma-separated patterns

inputs.name: forceCopy
inputs.label: Force Copying
inputs.helpMarkDown: Copy files that cannot otherwise be changed, e.g. read-only files

inputs.name: clear
inputs.label: Clear target folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delete the contents of the target folder before copying

inputs.name: recurseDelete
inputs.label: Recurse clear
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delete files from subfolders too (only relevant if include/exclude patterns protect those folders)

inputs.name: includeDelete
inputs.label: Include
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delete only files fitting these comma-separated patterns

inputs.name: excludeDelete
inputs.label: Exclude
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do not delete files fitting these comma-separated patterns

inputs.name: forceDelete
inputs.label: Force Delete
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delete files that cannot otherwise be changed, e.g. read-only or hidden files
